FuncDef: The display mpls te link-administration admission-control command displays CR-LSP information such as bandwidth or priority values on an interface.
CLIs: display mpls te link-administration admission-control [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about CR-LSPs on a specified interface.
-

Examples: LspID           In/Out IF         S/H Prio    CT       BW(kbps)
* means the LSP is detour LSP
LspID              In/Out IF           S/H Prio   CT   BW(kbps)
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about CR-LSPs passing through a specified interface, run the display mpls te link-administration admission-control command. The command output includes the inbound and outbound interfaces, priority values, CT types, and bandwidth.
